SELECT /* HldStckClsMapper.selectHldStckClsList */ B.NO /*순번*/ ,NVL(B.STOCK_NAME,A.STCNM ) AS STOCK_NAME /*주식명*/ ,NVL(B.STOCK_QUANTITY, 0) AS STOCK_QUANTITY /*주식보유수*/ ,A.DVDNCYC AS DIVIDEND_CYCLE /*배당주기*/ ,NVL(B.PURCHASE_PRICE,0) AS PURCHASE_PRICE /*매입금*/ ,NVL(C.DIVIDEND, A.DVDN) AS DIVIDEND_AMOUNT /*배당금*/ ,B.REGYMD AS RGSTDATE /*등록일자*/ ,B.MDFCNYMD /*수정일자*/ FROM STOCKINFORMATION A /*주식정보*/ LEFT JOIN STC_RGST_DTLS B /*주식 등록 내역*/ ON ( A.TIKER = B.TIKER AND B.DELYN = 'N' ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY TIKER ORDER BY TRNSCDATE DESC) AS RNK, TIKER, AMOUNT, DIVIDEND FROM TRANSACTION ) W WHERE RNK = 1 ) C ON (A.TIKER = C.TIKER) WHERE 1=1 AND A.DELYN = 'N' AND A.USEYN = 'Y'
AND A.STCNM = #{stockName}
AND (A.DVDNCYC like #{dividendCycle} || '%' OR A.DVDNCYC = '월' )
ORDER BY DECODE(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(B.STOCK_QUANTITY,'[[:punct:]]','')), 0, 999, 0), (CASE WHEN REGEXP_LIKE(A.TIKER, '^[0-9]+$') THEN 2 ELSE 1 END), A.STCNM

SELECT /* HldStckClsMapper.hldStckClsDetail : 주식 상세 조회 */ A.STOCK_NAME AS STOCK_NAME , /*주식명*/ A.STOCK_QUANTITY, /*주식보유수*/ A.PURCHASE_PRICE, /*매입금 */ REGEXP_REPLACE(A.STOCK_QUANTITY,'[[:punct:]]','') * A.PURCHASE_PRICE AS PURCHASE_PRICE_SUM, /*매입금(합계)*/ SUM(NVL(B.AMOUNT, 0)) AS AMOUNT /*배당금(누적)*/ FROM STC_RGST_DTLS A , TRANSACTION B WHERE 1=1 AND A.TIKER = B.TIKER(+) /*AND A.STOCK_QUANTITY > 0*/ AND A.STOCK_NAME = #{stockName} AND A.DELYN = 'N' GROUP BY A.STOCK_NAME , A.STOCK_QUANTITY, A.PURCHASE_PRICE
mapper.update: UPDATE /* HldStckClsMapper.hldStckClsUpdate : 주식 수정 */ STC_RGST_DTLS SET STOCK_NAME =#{U_STOCK_NAME} /*주식명*/ ,STOCK_QUANTITY =#{U_STOCK_QUANTITY} /*주식보유수*/ ,PURCHASE_PRICE =#{U_PURCHASE_PRICE} /*매입금*/ ,DELYN =#{U_CLSCD} ,MDFCNYMD =sysdate WHERE NO = #{U_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT /* HldStckClsMapper.hldStckClsInsert*/ INTO STC_RGST_DTLS ( NO ,TIKER ,STOCK_NAME ,STOCK_QUANTITY ,PURCHASE_PRICE ,DELYN ,REGYMD ,MDFCNYMD ) VALUES( TRIM((SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(TO_NUMBER(NO))+1, '0000000000000000000') FROM STC_RGST_DTLS)) ,(SELECT MAX(TIKER) FROM STOCKINFORMATION WHERE STCNM = #{U_STOCK_NAME}) /* 티커 */ ,#{U_STOCK_NAME} /*주식명*/ ,#{U_STOCK_QUANTITY} /*주식 보유 수*/ ,#{U_PURCHASE_PRICE} /*매입금*/ ,'N' ,sysdate ,sysdate )
